author: Kelly Dawson
title: Finding refuge in China as the epicentre of the coronavirus pandemic shifts
description: At first Kelly Dawson thought she would be safer in her native United States, but now she is glad she is in Beijing.
content: Beijing, China - As COVID-19 accelerates outside of China, life in Beijing has resumed a cautious rhythm. In recent weeks, I have taken solace in a new ritual made necessary by increased restrictions: at the start and end of each day, walking through the cent… [+4718 chars]
